objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Business/Corporate themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Business/Corporate narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Business/Corporate lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a corporate or business challenge involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a business context
Students engage in business themed role-play about technology in daily life using slang register
Students create original business themed content about technology in daily life in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Business/Corporate scenario?
What strategy or negotiation might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Business/Corporate story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Business/Corporate perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this business scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Business/Corporate situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using slang register in business context
Character B: Responding in slang register within business theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with strategy
technology in daily life with negotiation
technology in daily life with stakeholder

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Business/Corporate theme: Professional scenarios, workplace situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Business/Corporate themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
